Note:
To track your health, you can either use  
 the digital counters or the health cards  

Right-click the counters to remove health
LuaScript:
--[[ Lua code. See documentation: http://berserk-games.com/knowledgebase/scripting/ --]]

--[[ The OnLoad function. This is called after everything in the game save finishes loading.
Most of your script code goes here. --]]
function onload()
    --[[ print('Onload!') --]]
end

--[[ The Update function. This is called once per frame. --]]
function update ()
    --[[ print('Update loop!') --]]
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
BEFORE Tourney Round begins, give this card to an opponent.

The recipient of this GIFT must tally his Weapon Hits as follows:

>Swords are valued at zero
>Sorcery and Deception is doubled

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Use ONCE and DISCARD

After you lose a Melee, discard the just-played cards instead of taking them as Weapon Hits.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
BEFORE the cards are dealt:

Draw 3 Godsend cards; choose one to use in the upcoming Tourney Round.

Place the unchosen cards on the bottom of the Godsend deck; discard this card.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When Weapon Hits are tallied at the end of the Tourney Round, the Sword cards you've taken are worth zero points.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Kidnap an opponent's Companion card and use those powers for the entire Tourney Round.

Return kidnapped card at the end of the Toruney Round.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
You will always play the last card in every Melee.

When you are supposed to play the lead card in a Melee:

>Announce the suit everyone must follow.
>Player to the left plays the first card of the Melee.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
After your tally and score your Weapon Hits, take 2 of those Weapon Hit cards--to use in the next Tourney Round.

You will be dealt only 10 cards in the next Tourney Round.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Alchemy-suited cards may be played AT ANY TIME during the Tourney Round.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Use ONCE and DISCARD

You may gather all the cards in each player's hand; shuffle the cards and deal out new cards.

May not be used DURING a Melee

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
DURING the Tourney Round
Whenever your play the lead card, draw one Godsend card and place it under this Round Table.

At the END of the TOURNEY ROUND
Choose one of the cards under the ROUND TABLE to use in the next Round (in addition to any other Godsend cards you may receive).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
You may opt out of one Melee during the Tourney Round.

Must be announced before you would normally play your Weapon card.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Choose one opponent to play the entire Tourney Round with their cards exposed.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Before the first Melee is played, give the FLAMING SWORD to an opponent.

At the end of the Tourney Round, that opponent must tally his Weapon Hits and double the result.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Use ONCE and DISCARD

You may exchange your entire hand with an opponent.

MAY NOT be used DURING a Melee.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: At the end of the Tourney Round, distribute all the Poisoned Weapon cards you've taken to any opponent or opponents, to take as Weapon Hits.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Before the first Melee, give this card to an opponent--who now must lead every Melee of the Toruney Round.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
May be used at ANY TIME.
Use ONCE and DISCARD.

Give this POISONED APPLE to any opponent--to immediately decrease their Health by 25 points.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Use ONCE and DISCARD

Add 8 points to the value of any card--played by you or an oponnent--in a Melee.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Each tiem you lose a Melee, place one of the played cards under the BLEEDING LANCE.

At the end of the Tourney Round, give these cards to any opponent, to take as Weapon Hits.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
You may discard your Companion card to  IMMEDIATELY increase your Helath by 75 points.

Must be used before the final Melee of the Toruney Round is played

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
You may remove* up to 3 Poison Weapon cards that have been played (by you or an opponent) in a Melee.

*Place removed cards under the Fisher King; discard before Weapon Hits are tallied.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
CHOOSE ONE of the FOLLOWING:

Imeediately incrase your Health by 25 points.

or

At the end of the Tourney Round, increase your health by 50 points if you also increase an opponent's Health by 25 points.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
USE ONCE and DISCARD

After losing a Melee, tally the Injury from the just-played Weapon cards and increase your Health by that amount.

Discard those Weapon cards.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Whenever you play a Poisoned Weapon card, the highest card played loses the Melee.

This card does not cancel or reverse any action by Morgan le Fay.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
When played in a Melee:

Assign any suit and value to this card, even one that has already been played.

When taken in a Melee,
Worth 25 Injury Points

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
When played in a Melee:

Assign any suit and value to this card, even one that has already been played.

When taken in a Melee,
Worth 25 Injury Points

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
When played in a Melee:

Assign any suit and value to this card, even one that has already been played.

When taken in a Melee,
Worth 25 Injury Points

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
When played in a Melee:

Assign any suit and value to this card, even one that has already been played.

When taken in a Melee,
Worth 5 Injury Points

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
When played in a Melee:

Assign any suit and value to this card, even one that has already been played.

When taken in a Melee,
Worth 5 Injury Points

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Whenever Deception IS NOT the lead suit in a Melee:

You may place any Deception card from your hand onto the table instead of playing a card from the lead suit. Your card does not compete in the Melee, but the loser still must take it as a Weapon Hit.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
>Always play your Weapon card face down and reveal it at the end of the Melee.

>When leading the Melee, you must announce the suit of the card you have laid.

THREASHOLD for USE: 200 Health

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
You are ALWAYS dealt a second additional card.

Before the first Melee of a Tourney Round is played, place one of your dealt cards under LANCELOT, face down.

At the end of the Tourney Round, before Weapon Hits are tallied, reveal the hidden card.

All Weapon Hits from that suit are discarded by all players and cause no Injury.

THRESHOLD for USE: 150 Health

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
You are ALWAYS dealt one additional card.

Before the first Melee of a Tourney Round is played, place one of your dealt cards under Guinevere, face down.

At the end of the Tourney Round, before Weapon Hits are tallied, reveal the hidden card.

All Injury aquired from that suit is doubled for both you and your opponents.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
At the beginning of each Tourney, draw a Godsend card* to act as your Companion.

*Discard at the end of each round.

THRESHOLD for USE: 200 Health

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
At the beginning of each Tourney Round, draw a Godsend card* to act as your Protagonist.

This power cannot be stolen or borrowed from an opponent.

*Discard at the end of the round.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
MAY BE USED ONCE PER GAME

You may discard the Weapon Hits you've taken for one chosen Tourney Round; but must also discard the GREEN SASH after you have done so.

This power cannot be stolen or borrowed from an opponent.

AVAILABLE for USE AT ANY TIME

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
When you play a Deception card and lose the Melee:

All the WEapon cards you played shall remain on the table--to be taken by the player who loses the next Melee.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
At the START of each Tourney Round, place all three WILL OF GOD Tokens on this card.

Up to 3 times per Round you may replace opponent's played Weapon card with one from the top of the Weapon deck.

Remove one token from this card each time the WILL OF GOD power is used.

THRESHOLD for USE: 200 Health

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Before the first Melee:

>Reveal top 3 cards from the Weapons deck and add them to your hand.

>Discard any 3 cards from your hand and shuffle them back into the Weapons deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Weapon Hits totals are no longer doubled when determining your total Injury amount.

THRESHOLD for USE: 200 Health

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Whenever you play a Poisoned Weapon card, the highest card played loses the Melee.

At the end of each Tourney Round
>Tally your Weapon Hits.
>Double that result for your total Injury Amount.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.Description: Adds +3 to the value of any Sword Weapon card you play

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
After your total injury is recorded on your Health card:

Tally the Injury you've taken from Sword cards for the Tourney Round.

Rouble that amount: all of your opponents must add those points to their Injury totals.

THRESHOLD for USE: 200 Health

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may add +3 to the value of any Sword Weapon card you play.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.Description:
Left click - Increase
Right click - Decrease
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
MIN_VALUE = -99
MAX_VALUE = 999

function onload(saved_data)
    light_mode = false
    tooltip_show = true
    val = 400

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        val = loaded_data[2]
        tooltip_show = loaded_data[3]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, val, tooltip_show}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 95}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,95}
    else
        f_color = {0,0,0,100}
    end

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.createButton({
      label=tostring(val),
      click_function="add_subtract",
      tooltip=ttText,
      function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.05,-0.2},
      height=600,
      width=1000,
      alignment = 3,
      scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
      font_size=600,
      font_color=f_color,
      color={0,0,0,0}
      })

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getName(),
        input_function = "editName",
        tooltip=ttText,
        label = "Counter",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,0.05,1.7},
        width = 1200,
        height = 1000,
        font_size = 200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color= f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })


    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide value in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show value in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.2},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.6},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=150,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })


    self.createButton({
        label="[ Reset ]",
        tooltip="[ Reset ]",
        click_function="reset_val",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,1.4},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=250,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "#",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.8},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 600,
        height = 800,
        font_size = 1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value)
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -5 or 5
    new_value = math.min(math.max(val + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val ~= new_value then
        val = new_value
        updateVal()
        updateSave()
    end
end

function updateVal()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function reset_val()
    val = 0
    updateVal()
    updateSave()
end

function setTooltips()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value)
    reloadAll()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.Description:
Left click - Increase
Right click - Decrease

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
MIN_VALUE = -99

function onload(saved_data)
    light_mode = false
    tooltip_show = true
    val = 400

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        val = loaded_data[2]
        tooltip_show = loaded_data[3]

end

    local data_to_save = {light_mode, val, tooltip_show}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)

end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 95}

        f_color = {1,1,1,95}
    else
        f_color = {0,0,0,100}
    end

    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

      label=tostring(val),
      click_function="add_subtract",

      function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.05,-0.2},
      height=600,
      width=1000,
      alignment = 3,
      scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
      font_size=600,
      font_color=f_color,
      color={0,0,0,0}
      })

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getName(),
        input_function = "editName",
        tooltip=ttText,
        label = "Counter",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,0.05,1.7},
        width = 1200,
        height = 1000,
        font_size = 200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color= f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })


    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide value in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show value in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.2},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.6},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=150,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })


    self.createButton({
        label="[ Reset ]",
        tooltip="[ Reset ]",
        click_function="reset_val",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,1.4},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=250,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "#",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.8},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 600,
        height = 800,
        font_size = 1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)

        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value)
    reloadAll()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.Description:
Left click - Increase
Right click - Decrease
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
MIN_VALUE = -99
MAX_VALUE = 999

function onload(saved_data)
    light_mode = false
    tooltip_show = true
    val = 400

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        val = loaded_data[2]
        tooltip_show = loaded_data[3]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, val, tooltip_show}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 95}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,95}
    else
        f_color = {0,0,0,100}
    end

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.createButton({
      label=tostring(val),
      click_function="add_subtract",
      tooltip=ttText,
      function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.05,-0.2},
      height=600,
      width=1000,
      alignment = 3,
      scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
      font_size=600,
      font_color=f_color,
      color={0,0,0,0}
      })

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getName(),
        input_function = "editName",
        tooltip=ttText,
        label = "Counter",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,0.05,1.7},
        width = 1200,
        height = 1000,
        font_size = 200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color= f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })


    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide value in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show value in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.2},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.6},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=150,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })


    self.createButton({
        label="[ Reset ]",
        tooltip="[ Reset ]",
        click_function="reset_val",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,1.4},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=250,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "#",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.8},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 600,
        height = 800,
        font_size = 1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value)
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -5 or 5
    new_value = math.min(math.max(val + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val ~= new_value then
        val = new_value
        updateVal()
        updateSave()
    end
end

function updateVal()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function reset_val()
    val = 0
    updateVal()
    updateSave()
end

function setTooltips()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value)
    reloadAll()
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
You are ALWAYS dealt a second additional card

>Before the first Melee of a Tourney Round is played, put one of your dealt cards under ISOLDE face down.

>You may replace* a card you've played in a Melee with a face down card.

*Shuffle replaced card back into Weapons deck. If your played card doesn't follow suit, you take not Shame Injury.

THRESHOLD FOR USE: 250 Health

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
You are ALWAYS dealt one additional card.

>Before the first Melee of a Tourney Round is played, put one of yoru dealt cards under TRISTAN face down.

>You may replace* a card you've played in a Melee with the face down card.

*Shuffe replaced card back into Weapons deck. If your played card doesn't follow suit, you take no Shame Injury.
